text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryRoss Great news reopening to fast has sent coronavirus cases spiking across the nation, with 1-2000k dying daily. People won’t wear masks, big surprise when you have a leader that refuses to follow his own guidelines... 200k and counting dead americans by the end of summer 👍🇺🇸
